text:
Champions League
OL - Benfica: the notes of the Lyonnais!
Discover the notes of Olympique Lyonnais players after the match against Benfica on Tuesday night.
05 Nov 2019, 21:55 by Rafael Da Silva



OL - Benfica: Lyonnais' scores Tonight, Olympique Lyonnais received Benfica for the fourth Champions League group match. Discover the notes of Lyon players.Icon Sport



Anthony Lopes6 / 10: relatively quiet evening for the Portuguese goalkeeper, who did not need to employ so much.Icon Sport



Youssouf Kon√©5 / 10: a lot of activity and combativeness but a lot of waste also from the left side of Mali. Best in the second half.Icon Sport



Joachim Andersen7 / 10: first scorer of this match, the Danish central defender may have just delivered his best performance in his new colors, he who was solid behind.



Jason Denayer6 / 10: Serene in his interventions, it will have been just as much in his raises. To note a rather lax marking on Seferovic on the reduction of the score of Switzerland.Icon Sport



L√©o Dubois6 / 10: decisive passerby for the opening of Andersen's score, the French international has been able to project himself in an intelligent way without being overflowed during this match.Icon Sport



Houssem Aouar6,5 / 10: his replacement left seems to have been beneficial, he has plenty of time to go on his right foot to deliver caviars galore. Huge activity on the part of the international Espoirs.Icon Sport



Lucas Tousart5,5 / 10: The midfielder has been relatively discreet, playing simple with his teammates.Icon Sport



Thiago Mendes6 / 10: solid, the former LOSC player did not hesitate to project himself unlike his teammate in midfield.Icon Sport



Jeff Queen-Adelaide6,5 / 10: not stingy of efforts, the former player of Angers will have weighed on this defense of Benfica, which had difficulties to contain it. Some technical waste without consequences.Icon Sport



Memphis Depay6,5 / 10: if it remained only half-time on the meadow, the Batavian was able to put in value. Author of the second goal of the match, his fourth this season in the Champions League, he asserts himself more and more as the boss of this attack.Icon Sport



Moussa Demb√©l√©4 / 10: a disappointing performance from the attacker, who will have nothing to put in their mouths on Tuesday night. In his defense, he was often forgotten by his teammates ... Icon Sport



Maxwell Cornet4,5 / 10: Depay's replacement at the start of the second half, the Ivorian striker will have nothing concrete.Icon Sport

OL - Benfica: the notes of the Lyonnais!

This Tuesday night, Olympique Lyonnais hosted Benfica for the fourth regular phase match of the Champions League. The men of Rudi Garcia had to win after the victory of Leipzig on the lawn of Zenith Saint-Petersburg a little earlier in the evening (2-0).
Thus, discover the notes of the players Lyonnais after this ...




Classification :




Anthony Lopes was expected to turn Tuesday night + 13 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport


1. Leipzig - 9 points (+2)
2. OL - 4 points (+1)
3. Zenith - 4 points (-1)
4. Benfica - 3 points (-2)
